data.text: “Starting to feel like summer out here.”

Will you be able to say you did all you can to help elect @andrewyang, a sensible, consensu…
Thank you to everyone who contributed - we had a great last day!  Look forward to reporting results soon!
Having a great night - thank you to everyone for donating! Let’s break the all-time record in NYC by the deadline at midnight tonight! https://t.co/mQGy4DXbpw

Like so many Americans, I am ecstatic about the news that President Biden’s direct cash payments will start coming to families this July. I’m proud of the movement we built to fight for cash relief - and hope to bring those values to NYC. https://t.co/sxDQoORt5Z

We have 7 hours left until our big public fundraising deadline, so here’s a leaderboard! Go to https://t.co/LLaeW3W4h7 and chip in any amount that’s available on the leaderboard. Then within minutes your name will appear on the board! Let’s do this Yang Gang 😀🙏🚀

Sat down with @AdamAJRbrothers of @AJRBrothers about he and his brothers making music together as kids on the streets of New York, finding their sound, making money in music, the joy of live performance, his thesis and environmental activism, and much more. They go on tour soon! https://t.co/CthuL5mxUN

Hello! This is our LAST CHANCE to unlock matching funds before the election! When any NYC resident gives $25 in the next 24 hours, we’ll receive $225! Go to https://t.co/LKOZWLOCPR to make your mark and multiply your impact. Thank you! 😀🙏 https://t.co/ilLkKc39mL

Celebrating a great debate with volunteers tonight!  😀❤️🗽 https://t.co/CW1xsJUBqb
https://t.co/j44fQxF4XV

NYCHA should be the best housing in our city. Residents deserve representation in the decisions that impact their everyday lives - tenant democracy is critical for a new era of New York. #NYCMayoralDebate

NYC will never fully thrive if New Yorkers can't afford rent or fulfill their dreams of owning a home. As mayor I'll enact sweeping reforms to reduce street homelessness by 50%, expand supportive housing, and build or preserve 250,000 affordable units - the most in a generation. https://t.co/wjn7hznhnD
RT @yangparany: La Ciudad de Nueva York necesita un alcalde que unirá a Neoyorquinos y hará que nuestros vecinos se sientan seguros, espera…

Cash relief is the difference between New Yorkers putting food on the table, or not; having a roof over their heads, or not. We will implement the nation's largest cash relief program right here in New York. #YangForMayor
We need to reject the status quo and elect new leadership with new ideas to move our city forward. #YangForMayor https://t.co/xq05W018yw
We must cap delivery services’ fees on restaurants and ensure restaurants have access to their data. This is how we give NYC’s restaurants a chance to survive. #YangForMayor https://t.co/wQQGpy7YX6

I will create a small business landscape reflecting NYC’s diversity with short-term leases for pop-up businesses in vacant storefronts, help business owners with back rent, and loans and grants focused on women, people of color, and immigrant-owned businesses. #ny1debate

Small businesses are the lifeblood of our city and make NYC special. I’m committed to doing everything it takes to reinvest in our small business owners and equitably help them stay afloat, get back on their feet, and reopen. #YangForMayor https://t.co/ylcwvJT8bA https://t.co/cx9wgPs2VZ
Gun violence is a public health crisis. We need to target firearm traffickers to dismantle the iron pipeline of guns flowing into the city. NYC’s recovery depends upon our city’s safety. #ny1debate

When I talk to New Yorkers on the street, you are most concerned about three things: ending poverty, job creation, and public safety. We can deliver on these three things and you can count on these being my priority as mayor. #YangForMayor
https://t.co/pTBryoKvqV https://t.co/i3WCwRJR7u

New York City needs a mayor who will bring people together and make our neighbors feel safe, hopeful and optimistic again. I want to be that mayor, and I am excited to move our city forward - together. #YangForMayor https://t.co/mKEbs3qRz0
This is tonight! https://t.co/9ni5YoLzuU

We have the best volunteers - thanks for coming out to our sign painting party yesterday! Your passion and creativity are what fuels our movement for a new era of new ideas for the city we love. 😀❤️ Join Team Yang next time in your neighborhood: https://t.co/fJHqb5T6i2 https://t.co/hqokPJfYco

So proud to receive the endorsement of NY state senator @tobystavisky and announce our plans for an Education Opportunity Fund for kids who need more support and Universal Early Learn for our youngest children. Let’s set our kids up to succeed.  👍 https://t.co/5fvW5J3m2g https://t.co/s9jEBa1U42
Senator Toby Stavisky Endorses Andrew Yang https://t.co/Tl6ZSXvC9I
It feels like the Nets and Knicks are never in the playoffs at the same time.  That’s changing this year.
RT @Freakonomics: The Future of New York City Is in Question. Could Andrew Yang Be the Answer? This week on Freakonomics Radio: https://t.c…
The Nets look on track for the 2 seed. As long as they are healthy they have a great chance against anyone.
The Knicks are back in the playoffs for the first time since 2013 and the Mets have won 7 in a row.

I am so pumped for the debate tomorrow night (5/13) on NY1! Come join Team Yang at 6:30pm ET for a virtual debate watch party with supporters from across the five boroughs. Change is in the air - let’s go, NYC! 🙌🗽 RSVP: https://t.co/xBXycQoSHB https://t.co/gBLDQRK648

🙏 https://t.co/uzrf9PbiR4

Honored to be endorsed by NY State Senator @JeremyCooneyROC who is launching a basic income bill in the state house. These are the kinds of relationships that will deliver for the people of NYC. Learn more about my plan for basic income in New York: https://t.co/9MfmOwVqYU https://t.co/nS0BFIph9Q

Our kids deserve a clear plan to fully reopen schools 5 days a week with extracurriculars and sports by the Fall.  Thank you Megan Rha for sharing your story as a public school parent of 5.  Let’s get our schools open for the sake of our families. https://t.co/rxclm3kVdp

I'm standing with the people of Israel who are coming under bombardment attacks, and condemn the Hamas terrorists. The people of NYC will always stand with our brothers and sisters in Israel who face down terrorism and persevere.

Me:  “Every other day but this one.”

My number one priority as mayor will be keeping us and our families safe from harm every single day.

Addressing the Times Square shooting with @KeithPowersNYC @WilliamAllenNYC @EdwinRaymondNYC - public safety is paramount. The police will be key to our recovery.
